title: An Act to increase enrollment in affordable health plan networks

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Robertson of Tewksbury, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1298) of David Allen Robertson for legislation to increase enrollment in affordable health plan networks.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
